text: Spencer Fox (born May 10, 1993) is an American musician, singer and actor. He is best known as the voice of Dash Parr in The Incredibles and was the original voice of Mudbud in Air Buddies. He is also the guitarist and vocalist of the power pop band Charly Bliss. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Film Role Notes 2004 The Incredibles Dash Parr (voice) 2006 The Groomsmen Jack 2006 Air Buddies Mudbud (voice) 2007 Neal Cassady Mickey Mature 2011 Light Spencer ===Television=== Year Television Role Notes 2007 Kim Possible Tim Possible, Jim Possible (voice) Season 4 2009 Cupid Music Geek Episode: "Left of the Dial" ===Video games=== Year Video Game Voice Notes 2004 The Incredibles Dash Parr (voice) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:1993 births Category:Actors from New York City
title: Spencer Fox
